com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Class ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.corpus.AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
      • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader
        • com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader
          • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedCorpusReader, ParserAnnotatedCorpusReader, PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader, SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader, TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader, CurrentFileObserver

    public class ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader
extends PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader
implements ParserAnnotatedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one pos-tagged token with dependency info per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction, via a CorpusLineReader.
    The following placeholders are required:
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement.INDEX, CorpusLine.CorpusElement.TOKEN, CorpusLine.CorpusElement.POSTAG, CorpusLine.CorpusElement.LABEL, CorpusLine.CorpusElement.GOVERNOR.
    These are included surrounded by % signs on both sides, and without the prefix "CorpusElement."
    Example (note that the regex is applied to one line, so no endline is necessary): 
     %INDEX%\t%TOKEN%\t.*\t%POSTAG%\t.*\t.*\t%NON_PROJ_GOVERNOR%\t%NON_PROJ_LABEL%\t%GOVERNOR%\t%LABEL%
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
